Volt is a movement: Volt is a movement of citizens from all over Europe who volunteer to work towards a more progressive, participatory and pan-European way of doing politics - with an emphasis on redefining what ecological principles, solidarity and democracy should mean in the 21st century.
With this calendar: With this calendar, we want to present a selection of proposals for Lille - collected in workshops and citizen participation projects here and elsewhere in Europe.
We are a movement: We are a movement that has become a political party. Our goal for municipalities in Lille is to find citizens who will carry these ideas to the city council - Twenty 'courageous' on the first places and witnesses to complete the list.
Follow us, share: Follow us, share these ideas or get in touch if you're willing to be part of this citizens' project in Lille.
Founded after the vote for Brexit: Founded after the Brexit vote, Volt is a pan-european, participative and progressive movement. We are active in 32 countries and have registered political parties in 13 with our goal of trying to be the voice for all those that believe in the necessity of a stronger, more democratic and transparent Europe.
We want to present our program: We want to use this calendar to present our program for the upcoming European elections, called the Amsterdam Declaration. The Declaration was created by Volt volunteers from all over Europe and accepted on our national assembly in Amsterdam. We will introduce one of our propositions every day until the end of the year.
Follow the calendar, discuss proposals: Follow the calendar, share and discuss proposals and concrete steps with us on social media or join us  to help adapt policies on national and local levels as well as to prepare for the European Elections
and since there are more propositions: ... and since we have more propositions, we will continue until the end of the year.
